title: Implement Core Task Management (CRUD)
description: Implement the basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality for tasks. This includes adding new tasks, editing existing tasks, and deleting them. Tasks should be persisted to localStorage.
acceptance_criteria: User can add a new task to the 'Inbox'.
User can edit the text of an existing task.
User can delete a task.
Tasks are saved to localStorage and persist between sessions.

title: Develop GTD Task Organization
description: Implement the GTD workflow, allowing users to move tasks between 'Inbox', 'Next Actions', and 'Waiting' lists. Completed tasks should be moved to the 'Done' list.
acceptance_criteria: User can move a task from 'Inbox' to 'Next Actions'.
User can move a task to 'Waiting'.
Marking a task as complete moves it to the 'Done' list.
The UI correctly displays tasks based on the selected view.

title: Integrate Pomodoro Timer
description: Add a Pomodoro timer to the application. The timer should have 'Focus' (25 min) and 'Break' (5 min) modes, and should be displayed prominently in the UI.
acceptance_criteria: User can start a 25-minute focus timer.
User can start a 5-minute break timer.
The timer display updates every second.
The timer can be stopped and reset.

title: Implement Browser Notifications
description: Integrate browser notifications to alert the user when a Pomodoro session is complete. The application should request notification permission on startup.
acceptance_criteria: The app requests permission for notifications on first load.
A notification is sent when the Pomodoro timer finishes.
The notification includes a clear message and a sound alert.

title: Refine UI/UX and Accessibility
description: Improve the overall user interface and experience. This includes adding smooth animations, ensuring a responsive layout, and implementing accessibility features like keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
acceptance_criteria: The application is fully responsive and usable on different screen sizes.
All interactive elements are accessible via keyboard.
The application is tested with a screen reader to ensure proper ARIA roles and labels.
UI animations are smooth and do not hinder usability.

title: Write Unit and Integration Tests
description: Write comprehensive unit and integration tests for the application's core logic using Jest. This includes testing task management functions, state manipulation, and timer controls.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests cover all major functions in the codebase.
Test coverage meets a predefined threshold (e.g., 80%).
All tests pass successfully.

title: Create End-to-End Tests
description: Create end-to-end tests using Playwright to simulate user workflows. This will involve testing the entire application flow, from adding a task to completing it.
acceptance_criteria: E2E tests cover the main user scenarios (e.g., adding and completing a task).
Tests are run in a headless browser and pass consistently.
Screenshots or videos are generated for failed test runs to aid in debugging.
